column3: Concept ACK, the file is produced in the makefile (though, not by any umbrella rule), so it should be ignored\n\nalso code review ACK 290c5c6ae80668a1e8090be74f653b0f24704d97
@fanquake \nOn master testing `make deploy` on High Sierra 10.13.6. Cannot observe mentioned artefacts.\nWhich macOS version do you use?
@hebasto The artefacts occur when building for a macOS HOST on a Linux machine.

Tested master branch on Linux Mint 19.2:
```
cd depends
make HOST=x86_64-apple-darwin14 SDK_PATH=`pwd`/SDKs
cd ..
./configure --prefix=`pwd`/depends/x86_64-apple-darwin14
make deploy
```

Artefacts:
- `dist/` folder -- observed
- `dpi36.background.tiff` -- observed
- `dpi72.background.tiff` -- observed
- `osx_volname` -- _not_ observed
ACK c84ff23c6daade5145d960e1ac26596ddede2da1, tested on Linux Mint 19.2:\n- `make` with targets `osx_volname`, `deploydir` and `deploy` creates the mentioned artefacts\n- `make clean` removes them
Do you have any other files than the already ignored `Bitcoin-Qt.app` in here?
